## Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a portable shower system for air deployment requiring DND palletization. The technical requirement is outlined in the attached 'Annex Requirement'. The awarded contract is for one firm year, with two, one year options to the lowest-priced, compliant bidder. The firm requirement must be delivered by March 31, 2025.

## Procurement Information

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Compliance with Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, etc.
* Regions of Opportunity: Note none specified
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except NCR)
* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Person: Christopher Harvey, christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Required Documents

* Complete and signed bid submission form
* Technical proposal
* Details of bid and pricing
* Supporting documentation

## Bid Submission

Bid submissions must be received by 14:00 EST on 2024-07-26. Any bid submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Annexed Documents

* [Annex Requirement] - detailed technical requirement of the portable shower system

### Notes

* Only bids from compliant, lowest-priced, and responsive bidders will be considered.
* The Department of National Defence will not be responsible for any lead times, costs, delays, or issues caused directly or indirectly by the lack of availability of essential equipment, materials, or other factors.
